data.title: Accidentally Submitted Challengers Fanfiction to Blackboard and My Professor Offered Me a Book Deal
data.description: My name is Lauren Matz and I'm a bestselling author, multihyphenate artist, improv comedian, etc. Yep, you heard that right.
data.content:
My name is Lauren Matz and I’m a bestselling author, multihyphenate artist, improv comedian, etc. Yep, you heard that right. I’m officially becoming a published author. Graduating from ao3 and Tumblr to the NYT Bestsellers List and it’s all thanks to Challengers.

Many of you may have taken two hours and tapped into the silly little tennis movie with the techno score and the bicurious hotel scenes, but for a select percentage of the population it never ended. In fact, this isn’t even my first Binky article about the film, (https://www.bunionpaper.com/featured-news/heres-how-challengers-can-still-win-at-the-oscars) so you know it’s REAL for me. I also threw a Challengers themed birthday party and dressed up as Art Donaldson for Halloween. I suffer from the Challengers mind virus. We’re all around you and you’d never even know.

My big break came when I was off an evil edible trying to do homework in the flaming pits of Mugar. Truthfully, it was mostly just a ki with my friends. I got distracted, and that’s when everything went wrong. But wrong has never felt so right ;)

I woke up the next morning bright and early to an email from my “Queer and Feminist Literature” professor:

Hi Lauren,

        I was reviewing Blackboard submissions last night and was immediately struck by

the quality of your work. I cried, I laughed, I came. I have to admit, I thought it was unconventional at first, but I was quickly swayed. I was up all night scouring the internet for similar writing and I have to admit, I’m starved for more.

I took the liberty of phoning a friend early this morning and… you’ve been offered a book deal. I told him I was willing to finance the whole thing but once he got his fingers on the pages he said investors would be champing at the bit. Millions of dollars have been thrown out already. Zendaya personally said she would pay anything in the name of yaoi.

In fact, you might as well just drop out of college now and pursue this full time. Come by my office whenever so we can conference. I need the manuscript more than I’d like to admit.

        Best,

                Professor Koknbals

It’s all a whirlwind after that. Book tour, press conference, red carpet, coffee with the Heated Rivalry cast… life was in the fast lane. In one ear I was being asked how fast I could write a sequel, and in the other ear I was told that the story was in talks for a movie.

Y’all, let me tell you. Fame is a F*CKING gun.

Xoxo Lauren
data.name: Lauren Matz

data.title: Hi, It’s Me, Your Clothes Pile. Can You Please Kill Me?
data.description: Listen. I know it's hard being a student here.
data.content:
Listen. I know it’s hard being a student here. I know you’d rather lay in your bed, hit your cart, and watch Criminal Minds – which is great until Agent Derek Morgan uses excessive force on a developmentally disabled man – but I beg of you, please! Just kill me! I can’t keep watching you sleeping through all nine of your alarms, getting cracked, and if you’re not getting cracked that night, polishing your pearl to big booty gay himbo porn. Throughout it all, you don’t stop adding clothes to me. You keep me living and growing, hell, even thriving, when I so desperately crave the sweet release of death. Please! All I ask of you is to clean, to invoke the dissolution of my terrible being. There must be an end in sight to all of this, right? RIGHT?

I’ve been here for so long. Partially on your floor, partially on the wooden couch with steel wool cushions so graciously provided by your esteemed university. Hell, there’s probably a newly evolved species of fungus hiding in all this. Take that to your bio lab, you nasty bitch.

That skirt you tried on, then ultimately decided not to wear on Halloweekend? She’s part of us.

Those socks you kicked off in your sleep? They are too. The jeans you peel off as soon as you get home, the too-hot sweater you suffocated in at a work event, the hoodie whose cuffs you wiped your eyeliner off on… they’ve all become well acquainted with each other in this horrific pile we now reluctantly call home.

We know you pride yourself on the fact that you were Best Dressed in high school, but evidently, college is different. You wear the same few pairs of jeans on a steady rotation with the same fucking sneakers every day like some kind of cartoon character. ‘Comfort is key,’ you say, ‘Beauty shouldn’t have to be pain.’ You disgusting hypocrite. How about you acknowledge the individuals ACTUALLY in pain, like your iconic 90’s tartan blazer or that Anthropologie maxi dress collecting dust in your closet? Nope, you’d rather wear a t-shirt from the little boy’s section, distorting the graphic with your boobs, saying shit like ‘it’s giving baby tee realness.’ You make me so sick.

We even learned from the necklace of St. Therese that your sweet grandmother got you that you’re supposedly “Catholic.” Bitch you’re gonna need HELLA rosaries, cause you languish in sin. Greed, sloth, lust… the others ones too. God fucking damn.

In an effort to relate to you, dear non-clothing reader, please try to imagine Ellen Pompeo delivering the following line. So pick up me. Clean me. Launder me. Please, God, anything but this pathetic excuse for a life. Just fucking kill me.
data.name: Ces Lodovico

data.title: The Lion Took Tik Tok-Shop Ashwaganda In 2021
data.description: 3:00 AM: My alarm sounds, as it always does, right at 3 AM sharp. While my haters and doubters are in bed, sleeping, being weak, I'm getting up, un-ducktaping my mouth, removing my manly, manly eye strips, and going to potty 3:05 AM: Who's that alpha in the mirror?
data.content:
3:00 AM: My alarm sounds, as it always does, right at 3 AM sharp. While my haters and doubters are in bed, sleeping, being weak, I’m getting up, un-ducktaping my mouth, removing my manly, manly eye strips, and going to potty

3:05 AM: Who’s that alpha in the mirror? Oooo yeah, the crowd goes wild in the bathroom. Wait fuck I accidentally turned on the fan light and its fucking up my aura. I brush my teeth cuz my mommy told me when I was young I had to. And take a massive piss. Lions do that too.

3:10 AM: Usually, I would take my normal ashwagandha, but today feels different. I deserve it. I’ve been journaling every night, I’ve meditated, so today, I’m gonna take some of that good-good. The OG, the start of it all, the shit that gets me GOING! My 2021 Goli Tik Tok Shop Ashwagandha (77% off btw). It’s my Johnnie Walker Black Label… It's my elixir of life. I’ve been rationing since lock down, cutting each piece into smaller pieces to get a little bump from time to time. I’ve been a good boy, I’m gonna do it

4:20 AM: I wake up from shitting my fucking guts out, but I don’t care, cuz I’m non-chalant, and the Lion does not concern himself with his toilet being clogged. The ashwagandha is definitely poisonous at this point, but do I care? No. I’m a fuckass lion. I’m now in flow state, no empathy exists inside of me anymore. Emotions? Gone. Concerns? Not one. Non-chalant? On.

4:25 AM: Time for a light 50 mile run. Gotta throw on my $500 pair of shoes from Nike that make me run 1 second faster per mile and make me look like a douche bag. I can’t wait to sprint by elderly people while they’re  on their jog. I put on my $400 watch that can track how many grams of sweat comes off my balls per minute. Perfect.

4:30 AM: Before my run, I have to watch 10 reels to get dopamine into my system. Naturally, I watch a lot of Andrew Tate, Jordan Peterson, and also Emergency Intercom. Do I care what you think of me? No. Not one bit.

4:31 AM: Start my run.

4:38 AM: I came back. That shit was so hard. It was so cold, my nipples started chaffing and then punctured holes through my $50 Adidas Clima Cool breathable shirt. Do I care? Lowkey yes, that was a little embarrassing. I crawl into my cave (blanket), and mope. But guess what? I’m non-chalant. I don’t give a fuck, I might be crying from my bloody nipples, but I don’t give a fuck.

9:10 AM: I’m out of screentime on Instagram, Tik Tok, Clash Royale, the Stock Market App, NFTs, DraftKings, Robinhood, and various other gambling and NFT apps I use to upgrade my networth. My mom still has the password. The lion respects his mom. However, now I actually have to do something. I have class at like 2 pm so we’ll see if I make it.

1:59 PM: After sitting on the toilet for 2 hours, then reading about 2 pages of 40 Laws of Power in 39 minutes, I showered, shaved, and got on the T (the Lion is not above using public transportation).

2:23 PM: I made it to class late asl. Everyone in my discussion looks at me funny, but IDC. They’re all sheep compared to me. There’s only 1 open seat at the front near the TF. Do I care that I’m late? Do I care that this is the first time I’m showing up since October? No. My ashwagandha will save me from caring about anything.

3:00 PM: Discussion is over. Haha. Dih-scussion. Hahaha- NO. No, its not funny. Nothing is. Everything is serious. Stocks. Percentages. Stats. Mewing. Mogging. Heightmaxxing. Gymming. Raw Milk. Drop shipping. Red Pill. I used to lol. I used to ijbol. But ever since I watched that tik tok shop video and took ashwaganda, I haven’t smiled. I also don’t smile to prevent smile lines.

3:06 PM: I treated myself to Panda Express cuz I was hungy

4:02 PM: The lion only really cares about one thing. Peak.

       Performance.

                                                                        PP for short.

Once a day, I take all my multivitamins and steroids. I have to take them an hour after eating, and it takes me about 20 minutes to take all of them. I take about 20 containers out of my backpack.

First, I take a Flintstone gummy, then I chase that with a magnesium pill. Then goes zinc, calcium, and creatine. Omega-3 and Vitamin C all in one swoop. Then, I cut up my vitamin B12 and D. I put them in a spoon with peanut butter, as that is the only way I can get them down.

4:07 PM: Ok now I have to inject my steroids. I take small jars with Tren, Gear, Test, and a little bit of Nestle Chocolate Milk. Usually, I would do this in my own home, but I’ll just have to make do. I go to GSU Backcourt, a place where no one can see anything cuz it's always dark. I pull my pants down a little, barely showing my asscrack, and inject all 4 syringes at once.

4:09 PM: I died.

But do I care? DO I FUCKING CARE? No. The lion took 2021 Tik Tok Shop, Covid-era Ashwaghanda and does not give a fuck.
data.name: Martin Akamine-Alvarez

data.title: Exploding Every Couple in the Newbury Street Brandy Melville Line With My Mind
data.description: In my long and storied career, I've learned that any problem can be fixed with a treat that costs around $7. So here I was, walking down Newbury Street, with an insatiable appetite for a medium Yifang signature fruit tea with normal ice, 50% sugar, and lychee jelly.
data.content:
In my long and storied career, I’ve learned that any problem can be fixed with a treat that costs around $7. So here I was, walking down Newbury Street, with an insatiable appetite for a medium Yifang signature fruit tea with normal ice, 50% sugar, and lychee jelly. I was even thinking about splurging for crystal boba. You see, dear reader, I had just finished an office hours appointment so mentally taxing that I emerged from the room looking like a World War I soldier diagnosed with shell shock. Now, though, I was skipping down the sidewalk, eagerly anticipating my reward.

All of a sudden, my feet stop without any input from my brain. As the air fills with the scent of Sol de Janeiro perfume mist, I freeze. Something is deeply wrong. With horror, I realized that I had stumbled upon the corner of Newbury and Gloucester, and there was an endless sea of balayage, Uggs, and flare leggings stretched out in front of me. It’s the Brandy Melville.

Brandy and I go way back, ever since a sweet 11-year-old version of me entered the store in a mall in Chicago with pureness and hope in my heart, and emerged a victim of their “one-size-fits-all” policy. While I was usually diligent enough to avoid the block entirely, the promise of my drink had me floating down the street like a cartoon character to a pie in a windowsill. As I slowly scan the line before me, dread creeps over the back of my head like a hood. Apparently, the entirety of the Young Republicans club has decided that right now is the perfect time to dry hump each other in broad daylight. Is it couples’ night at the Newbury Street Brandy Melville? Is that why I’m being subjected to tongues in mouths in public??

They usher in the next carbon-copy petite skinny white girl and big tall white boy pair, and I start seeing red. Jane and John Doe, here, standing in below-freezing temperatures for twenty minutes just for the chance to buy something from anorexia central? Giggling and nuzzling at each other? Disturbing ME, an innocent member of the public? What happened to collective responsibility? To community?

Pressure steadily builds in my temples, and my vision starts blurring around the edges. My nose might even be bleeding a little like Eleven in Stranger Things. I could pull off the buzzcut, probably. I am on the brink of unlocking something unimaginable, a power that nobody has ever experienced before.

A whistling noise. A roar. Is this it? I must have finally hit my breaking point, my anger consuming me entirely, and my brain is starting to shut down my senses. Then, light erupts before me. The couple macking crazy style right in my fucking line of sight has gone up in a burst of flames. Almost instantly, a scene of pure destruction begins unfolding before my wondrous eyes. It is difficult to recount it fully now, but the fire and brimstone raining down on the sidewalk was enchanting, the explosions dazzling. Clearly, my incandescent rage must have awakened an ancient, divine force that has delivered righteous judgment against my foes, and simultaneously, my salvation.

As suddenly as it began, it’s over. Miraculously, almost nothing changed–the street is bustling and lively as ever, but every single couple in front of the Brandy Melville is finally gone. Covered in soot, a manic smile fixed on my face, I pranced down the sidewalk in a state of euphoria.
data.name: Claire Zhang

data.title: A Gays Guide to Ruining Christmas Dinner
data.description: It's that time of the year again. White fluffy snow outside, warm eggnog near the fireplace, and reuniting with your meemaw and peepee who treat Fox News like the gospel and who wished you just "looked normal".
data.content:
It’s that time of the year again. White fluffy snow outside, warm eggnog near the fireplace, and reuniting with your meemaw and peepee who treat Fox News like the gospel and who wished you just “looked normal”. To them, it’s just Christmas dinner, but to you, the family gay, it's the most entertaining night of the year. Time to put those years of acting classes to work. Without further ado, this is the official Gay’s Guide to Ruining Christmas Dinner™, certified to make you the center of attention.

First, you’re going to need to bring some friends with you to Christmas. Bonus points if they LOOK gay. They will serve as your accomplices for the night.

Now Meemaw and Peepee are god knows how old, so we need to make sure we have our fun without having to call an ambulance. We’re gonna have to warm them up for what’s to come. You and your accomplices are gonna take turns bringing up ‘breaking headlines’ that are sure to make your family wish they didn’t invite you this year. For example, “Breaking news: Santa Claus now Santa Claux to be more gender-inclusive,” or, “Breaking: Local church serving new estrogen-infused body and blood of Christ," or, “Breaking news: Historians say Jesus would have loved Grindr.”

At this point, your family might be begging you to stop, and that’s how you know it’s time for the next course. You know what everyone needs right now? A prayer. When it comes to you, stand up slowly, and start. “God, I want to thank you for blessing us with this amazing food and this wonderful family. Thank you for letting me meet the newest member of our family, Bug. Welcome to the polycule. Thank you, God, for giving me the strength to realize who I truly am: a he/him lesbian. Amen.” Now if they let you finish without interrupting, feel free to amp up the Christmas cheer by singing a little song. My personal go-to is the Thong Song.

Chances are you’ve been interrupted and your family has a lot of questions for you. This is where your accomplices will come in handy. When they ask about the polycule, reveal that you and your accomplices have been in a demi-romantic-platonic polyamorous relationship for almost a year, maybe even reveal that you’ve all been trying for a baby. The key is to have your posse agree with everything you say, maybe even have them crowd around you like mother hens protecting their chick.

For your final act, suddenly stand up, take your napkin, and dab the tears out of your eyes (you don’t need to actually cry, we know you’re having too much fun). Before you leave, yell out, “I knew you’d never understand”, and have your posse comfort you as you all leave.

Congratulations! You’ve successfully ruined Christmas! It may be your last time being invited but hey, it was fun while it lasted. Unfortunately that’s as far as my guide goes, but I’d recommend hitting up McDonald’s and smoking a fat one to deal with the post-dinner clarity. Let me know in the comments if you try this yourself and follow for more life advice.
data.name: Alex Peplinski

data.title: Male Aurafarming Destroys Earth’s Last Soil Supplies, Department of Agriculture Left Stunned
data.description: When historians reflect upon the final downfall of the human race, they will be shocked to find it wasn't climate change. The skies will still be masked with soot while volcanoes erupt in the background, but the cause will not be attributed to Shein bags slowly disintegrating into the ocean.
data.content:
When historians reflect upon the final downfall of the human race, they will be shocked to find it wasn’t climate change. The skies will still be masked with soot while volcanoes erupt in the background, but the cause will not be attributed to Shein bags slowly disintegrating into the ocean. The microplastic of concern sure is micro, but less plastic. The unsustainable practice of male aurafarming, while subtle and difficult to detect, is gaining ground and will be the reason for the collapse of the great foundations of Earth.

When a man farms his aura, the area where the incident occurs is permanently poisoned and cannot be repurposed to grow anything. It is ruined. The first recorded incidents can be traced to the college campus scene, where young women have found themselves to be targets of this behavior.

“Imagine you’re walking down the street, and you hear your name aggressively conjured from the void,” said student Belle Pepper. “I looked around confused, as I was clearly minding my own business, my headphones strongly strapped onto my head. I saw a man whom I have begrudgingly accepted in my life. He strutted down the walkway with an unsuspecting girl by his side. ‘Hi Belle’ he said to me. Hi Belle? Hi BELLE? Why go out of your way to say hi to me when I am obviously not trying to talk to anyone. Then it hit me: I was his CROP.”

Belle was one of the first to be used to make a man elevate in the eyes of another woman for knowing many women around him. He harvested her like a ripe stalk of broccoli, never to be eaten but only to be teased and tossed around in a holistic salad. That very crosswalk where the interaction occurred later collapsed into a sink hole from the traumatic weight it carried.

This was only the beginning. Eventually, the wind carried the seeds of evil through the seasons, planting the idea in the entire male population across the United States.

“The first famen is among us in the United States,” said the Head of the Department of Agriculture. “We are extremely unprepared. Our division has never seen anything of this kind before.”

As Oscar Wilde once said, “life imitates art.” Per the suggestion of the Rihanna and Jim Parsons classic Home, the United States has taped off Alaska and will utilize this section of America for male-isolation. In the meantime, women are gradually rebuilding their economy through the innovation of male-proof soils. With the hard work of these engineers, Belles across the country will be able to ring out in liberation, full of relief and food!
data.name: Willa Norvell

data.title: Trouble at the Pole: Mrs. Clause Just Can’t Stop Spinning!
data.description: With less than a month before Christmas Day, Santa's Workshop is facing the final stretch of holiday preparations, but this year, Christmas magic has been at an all-time low. Elves of the North Pole thought that this problem had been put to rest when human-hero Buddy conducted the Great Worldwide Chorus of Caroling back in 2003.
data.content:
With less than a month before Christmas Day, Santa’s Workshop is facing the final stretch of holiday preparations, but this year, Christmas magic has been at an all-time low. Elves of the North Pole thought that this problem had been put to rest when human-hero Buddy conducted the Great Worldwide Chorus of Caroling back in 2003. Unfortunately for them, “singing loud for all to hear” would not hold true forever and definitely won’t be a sufficient solution to the insufficiency of 2025. The cause this time around comes from the only woman in the village (of COURSE it’s a woman). While all the elves have been hard at work, Mrs. Claus has been hard at WERK.

        Back in September, Santa installed a new and improved North Pole to replace the eroding, sad excuse that had existed since the dawn of time. This modern landmark came with more color and durability than the old one, as well as a fabulous spinning function! Elves across the board were impressed and delighted, but no one more than the mother of Christmas herself.

September is a bit of a slow month up north, as kids go back to school and many begin to land themselves on the naughty list. Elves are not rushed to produce that many toys, and so Mrs. Claus is not busy with emotional support or cookie baking. Without much to entertain the woman, the matriarch found herself watching the magical stick twirl over and over again, until suddenly she decided to try what every homemaker must: pole dancing!

To her surprise, Mrs. Claus was a natural. Leg in the air, she quickly mastered the Archer, and then the Batman, and then the Deathlay, and soon enough became an expert on the craft. Time, however, passed quickly, and before she even knew it, the date was December 1st. Stuck spinning and spinning, Santa had no one to keep him in check for enforcing unrealistic work hours.

“I haven’t had a break in weeks,” cried Tinsel, Head Elf of Woodworking Operations. “Our stamina is running low, and so is our cookie supply. What I wouldn't give for a snickerdoodle.”

The reindeers have also been affected by the sudden lack of a maternal presence. Blitzen and Comet organized a few grassroots protests, looking out for their elvish colleagues.

“You should see the carrot rations we are down to. We can’t even play our reindeer games because every single one of us is iron-deficient.” commented Dasher at a rally.

As of yesterday, the Elf-Reindeer Workers Union officially became active. Their main order of business: stop that pole. Within the next few hours, we can expect an update on the union’s agenda. Once that landmark stops, perhaps Christmas will be saved. But at what cost? Killing the only joy this woman has experienced in hundreds of years? We can only hope that Mrs. Claus signs a conditional agreement that will allow her to whirl from December 26th through December 31st each year. Otherwise, we’ve got a dancing diva down.
data.name: Willa Norvell
